location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Messrs Smith, Elder and Company

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Brief letter requesting that his wooden box be sent overland to Bombay and that they realise his shares in the British India Steam Navigation Company order to pay fifty pounds to miss Annie [Anna Eudocia] Pelly.
